prea.recommender.llorma
Class WeakLearner

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      prea.recommender.llorma.WeakLearner
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class WeakLearner
extends java.lang.Thread

A class learning each local model used in singleton LLORMA. Implementation is based on weighted-SVD. Technical detail of the algorithm can be found in Joonseok Lee and Seungyeon Kim and Guy Lebanon and Yoram Singer, Local Low-Rank Matrix Approximation, Proceedings of the 30th International Conference on Machine Learning, 2013.

Since:
2013. 6. 11
Version:
1.2
Author:
Joonseok Lee

Constructor Detail

WeakLearner

public WeakLearner(int id,
                   int rk,
                   int u,
                   int i,
                   int au,
                   int ai,
                   double lr,
                   double r,
                   int iter,
                   SparseVector w0,
                   SparseVector v0,
                   SparseMatrix rm)
Construct a local model for singleton LLORMA.

Parameters:
id - A unique thread ID.
rk - The rank which will be used in this local model.
u - The number of users.
i - The number of items.
au - The anchor user used to learn this local model.
ai - The anchor item used to learn this local model.
lr - Learning rate parameter.
r - Regularization factor parameter.
w0 - Initial vector containing each user's weight.
v0 - Initial vector containing each item's weight.
rm - The rating matrix used for learning.

Getter method for current train error.

Returns:
The current train error.

run

public void run()
Learn this local model based on similar users to the anchor user and similar items to the anchor item. Implemented with gradient descent.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
